Loss of erections is an indicator you may have a health issue going on such as cardiovascular problems or diabetes or a thyroid issue.  It's a man's health barometer.Once you know what's going on, you can take supplements like L-arginine and others to help with your erections.  The most important thing is finding out if you have other health issues going on.
